cookie_consent.title: Cookie Consent
cookie_consent.content: We use cookies to ensure you get the best experience on our website. For more information on how we use cookies, please see our cookie policy.
cookie_consent.accept_pt2: you agree to our use of cookies.

home.title: React Typescript Learning
home.subtitle: This is a simple app to learn React with Typescript.
home.details:
The app was build for the learning reasons of FE. It is a simple app with a few pages and components.
The app is using React with Typescript, Redux, Redux-Saga, React-Router, etc.
home.contact: You can contact me via github: xcodeassociated
